channel.title: Moparscape Server Status Issue - Changing IPS?
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=70.80.246.171
That's my current one.. SORRY IF THIS IS CONSIDERED ADVERTISING >_<
I am trying to change it to my other dedi IP.
I can't figure out how to do that..
Can someone help?

item.title: Moparscape Server Status Issue - Changing IPS?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

This is what DNS is for, soon I’m going to disallow you to post an IP and force you to post a domain name, like you should in the first place.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape Server Status Issue - Changing IPS?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“RsProtocol, post:3, topic:357838”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=454349.msg3327077#msg3327077 date=1283192339]
Normally you use no-ip to set a DNS redirect. That way, if your IP changes, you can just change where the re-direct goes.
[/quote]

Eh, true. But I wasn’t expecting to change for a long time.

So I take it there is no possible way?[/quote]Nope, you need to wait for it to go below 40%

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape Server Status Issue - Changing IPS?

Normally you use no-ip to set a DNS redirect. That way, if your IP changes, you can just change where the re-direct goes.

So I take it there is no possible way?
